title: Which is the best KORG keyboard under Rs 50000-60000? - Quora

response.answer_text: Arranger or Workstation? Arranger, None. Buying a Korg Keyboard under 1 L price tag is risky nowdays. Korg kross is good. The arranger Keyboards have bad hardware (PA 600,microarranger). Id recommend you to put 15000 more and buy MoxF.
Right now the only available keyboard in this range from korg is the Korg Kross2 which is around 56000 Roland has xps30 in this range which costs 58000 Yamaha has PSR S670 in this range.
